title: Shaltay Boltai
extract: These actions are publicized on their blog, Shaltai Boltai, (Шалтай-Болтай, Russian for "Humpty Dumpty"), the name by which the group is also known. Over a period of 15 months the group published information about Russian politicians on 75 separate occasions.
extract_html: These actions are publicized on their blog, Shaltai Boltai, (Шалтай-Болтай, Russian for "Humpty Dumpty"), the name by which the group is also known. Over a period of 15 months the group published information about Russian politicians on 75 separate occasions.
